feed.title: Intelligent Mind Labs | Wiki
feed.subtitle: Wikis for Data Science, Computing, Software Development, Math, etc.

entry.title: Computer Science
entry.content:
Welcome to our Data Science Wiki, your ultimate resource for delving into the intricate world of machine learning, advanced machine learning, deep learning, numerical optimization, and advance optimization techniques, and the mathematics that underpin these fields. Our wiki is a comprehensive repository of knowledge, meticulously curated to provide insights, techniques, and resources for learners and practitioners alike.

Within our wiki, you’ll find in-depth articles, tutorials, and guides covering a wide range of topics:

What are the differences between C89 and C99 adsa asdsad safaw asdasd asd?

Within our wiki, you’ll find in-depth articles, tutorials, and guides covering a wide range of topics:

01 Networking

Within our wiki, you’ll find in-depth articles, tutorials, and guides covering a wide range of topics:

Tags:

01 | Linear Regression
Scalar Input Regression

Explained with a dataset where the input is described using just one feature.

Basic Gradient Descent

Emphasizes the key concepts underlying first-order optimization methods with respect to the scenario above.

Vector Input Regression

Explained with a dataset where the input is described using multiple features.

Multi-variate Gradient Descent

Emphasizes the key concepts behind 1st order optimization methods for multivariate cases.
02 | Logistic Regression
Vector Input Logistic Regression

Explained with a dataset where the input is described using multiple features.

Multi-class Classification

One vs All and One vs One techniques are discussed in details in regard to extend the logistic regression model for multi-class classification.
03 | SVM
Vector Input Logistic Regression

Explained with a dataset where the input is described using multiple features.

One vs All and One vs One techniques are discussed in details in regard to extend the logistic regression model for multi-class classification.

entry.title: Data Science
entry.content:
Welcome to our Data Science Wiki, your ultimate resource for delving into the intricate world of machine learning, advanced machine learning, deep learning, numerical optimization, and advance optimization techniques, and the mathematics that underpin these fields. Our wiki is a comprehensive repository of knowledge, meticulously curated to provide insights, techniques, and resources for learners and practitioners alike.

Within our wiki, you’ll find in-depth articles, tutorials, and guides covering a wide range of topics:

Machine Learning

Explore the foundations of machine learning, from supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms to model evaluation and selection techniques.

Deep Learning

Journey into the realm of deep learning, where neural networks revolutionize pattern recognition, natural language processing, and computer vision tasks. Learn about convolutional neural networks (CNNs), recurrent neural networks (RNNs), and state-of-the-art architectures like transformers.

Master the principles of numerical optimization, essential for fine-tuning machine learning models and solving optimization problems efficiently. Explore optimization algorithms such as gradient descent, stochastic gradient descent, and evolutionary strategies.

Our wiki is a comprehensive repository of knowledge, meticulously curated to provide insights, techniques, and resources for learners and practitioners alike.
